remarks: The partial sums of the series expansion of the exponential function of a positive real number are bounded by the value of the function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
statement:
effsumlt.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ^ n ) / ( ! ` n ) ) ) $.
effsumlt.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
effsumlt.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
effsumlt $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 0 ( + , F ) ` N ) < ( exp ` A ) ) $.
$d A n $.
